featured.text: The ballet dancers’ __________ movements delighted all the audience.

definition.zh_def: 一種高度技術性的舞蹈形式，通常在音樂伴奏下進行，並且以優雅的動作和精確的姿勢為特徵。
definition.en_def: A highly technical form of dance characterized by graceful movements and precise positions, typically performed to music.
definition.example: She has been practicing ballet since she was five years old.
